EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-03-05-Field-West-RD-Sponsored-Los-Angeles.Marketing Invitation 2.EMAIL
EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance: You're Invited: LA Lakers vs Portland Trailblazers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-losangeles/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
On behalf of Bill Veghte, Executive Chairman at Turbonomic, we'd like to cordially invite you to an exclusive executive networking event with our friends at Cisco in Los Angeles for a presentation on workload automation at the Ritz Carlton LA followed by an evening of basketball as Isaiah Thomas and the LA Lakers take on Damian Lillard and the Portland Trailblazers at the Staples Center.
Executive Networking Series Los Angeles Workload Automation for Your Hybrid Cloud LA Lakers vs Portland Trailblazers Monday, March 5th | Ritz Carlton LA | 6:00 p.m. <[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-losangeles/]]>
We hope you will join us and your technology peers for the next stop in our Executive Networking Series to share knowledge on tackling these challenges and learn how organizations like yours are adopting workload automation at the scale of hybrid cloud. Save the date for March 5th at 6:00 PM by registering at the following link: https://turbonomic.com/vip-losangeles/ <[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-losangeles/]]>
Sincerely,
The Turbonomic Team
